content: कवचः, --चं [<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 4. 2</ls>] {@--1@} An armour, coat of mail, a mail. {@--2@} An amulet, a charm, a mystical syllable (हुं-हूं) considered as a preservative like armour. {@--3@} A kettledrum.

कवचः, --चं [<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 4. 2</ls>] {@--1@} An armour, coat of mail, a mail. {@--2@} An amulet, a charm, a mystical syllable (हुं-हूं) considered as a preservative like armour. {@--3@} A kettledrum.
